title: Welcome to Sengani Girls School
description: Empowering young women through quality education and holistic development since 1985.

hero.title: Welcome to Sengani Girls School
hero.subtitle: Empowering young women through quality education and holistic development

introduction.title: Nurturing Excellence
introduction.description: Sengani Girls School is dedicated to providing a supportive and enriching environment where young women can develop their academic abilities, character, and leadership skills.

features.title: Academic Excellence
features.description: Comprehensive curriculum designed to foster critical thinking and academic achievement.

features.title: Holistic Education
features.description: Balanced approach combining academics with character development and life skills.

features.title: Supportive Community
features.description: Nurturing environment where every student feels valued and supported.

features.title: Leadership Development
features.description: Opportunities to develop leadership skills and confidence for future success.

testimonials.quote: Sengani Girls School provided me with the foundation I needed to succeed in life. The teachers were supportive and the environment was nurturing.
testimonials.author: Priya Sharma

testimonials.quote: The holistic approach to education at Sengani has helped my daughter develop both academically and personally.
testimonials.author: Mrs. Lakshmi Devi
